name: proof-of-humanity-circles-proxy
description: A contract for Proof of Humanity Circles integration

scripts.deploy:poh-circles: cross-env POH_CIRCLES_PROXY_CONFIG_PATH=./config/poh-circles.json npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/ProofOfHumanityCirclesProxyModule.ts --network gnosis
scripts.deploy:poh-test-rings: cross-env POH_CIRCLES_PROXY_CONFIG_PATH=./config/poh-test-rings.json npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/ProofOfHumanityCirclesProxyModule.ts --network gnosis
